body_html: Also the BeamSearchDecoder does not work with the multilayer cell wrapper, as the first dimension of the cell wrapper is number of layers. But BeamSearchDecoder expect initial_state to have batch_size*beam_size as the first dim.
body_text: Also the BeamSearchDecoder does not work with the multilayer cell wrapper, as the first dimension of the cell wrapper is number of layers. But BeamSearchDecoder expect initial_state to have batch_size*beam_size as the first dim.
body: Also the BeamSearchDecoder does not work with the multilayer cell wrapper, as the first dimension of the cell wrapper is number of layers. But BeamSearchDecoder expect initial_state to have batch_size*beam_size as the first dim.
